name: SUNRISE demo 2
description:
50% 

Think of this as a vertical slice of what SUNRISE is at the moment. Please put in headphones for the full experience. Try to explore everything you can see.

For context: This is right after the first demo. AVEDACI has been put in her crystalized state.

For the full experience go to the santorini website.

w- up   s- down  a- left  d-right  j- confirm/yes  k- cancel/no/pause
